description: Try our easy to follow Mini Beef Burgers On Pizza Bases With Chilli & Beetroot Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Beef Burgers On Pizza Bases With Chilli & Beetroot Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 290g double packet of pizza dough mix
1 small fresh red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dough, according to the packet instructions. Knead on a floured work surface for about 5 minutes until smooth. Place in an oiled bowl, and cover with a clean tea towel. Leave in a warm place until doubled in size.

Meanwhile, put all the ingredients for the burgers in a bowl, and season with salt and black pepper. Mix together well by hand. With damp hands, form the mixture into balls about the size of small walnuts - 36-40 balls. Sit on a large baking sheet lined with baking parchment, and press down with your thumb to flatten a little. Chill to firm, while the dough is rising.

Preheat the oven to 200°C. Once the dough has doubled in size, remove from the bowl, and knead lightly on a floured work surface. Roll out to about 5-6mm thick. Using a biscuit cutter, cut into 4-5cm discs, and place on a large baking sheet lined with baking parchment.

Transfer the trays of pizza bases and burgers to the oven. Bake for 10-15 minutes until the bases are golden and the burgers are cooked through. Warm through the tomato sauce. Put all the ingredients for the salad in a bowl, and stir through. To serve, spoon a little of the tomato sauce onto the pizza bases, then top with the burgers. Garnish with the beetroot salad, and serve immediately.
